verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O my Savior, glorified! Now the heavens, opened wide, Show to faith’s exultant eye One in beauteous majesty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Worthy of the sweetest praise That my ransomed heart can raise, Is that Man in whom alone God Himself is fully known.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For those clust’ring glories prove That glad gospel, “God is Love,” Whilst those wounds, in glory bright. Voice the solemn, “God is Light.”

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Hark, my soul! thy Savior sings; Catch the joy that music brings, And, with that sweet flood of song, Pour thy whisp’ring praise along.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O my Savior, glorified, Turn my eye from all beside, Let me but Thy beauty see, Other light is dark to me.
